Translations.Text: Yakhana ami payagambaraganera kacha theke, apanara kacha theke ebam nuha, ibrahima, musa o mariyama tanaya isara kacha theke angikara nilama ebam angikara nilama tadera kacha theke drrha angikara.
Satyabadiderake tadera satyabadita samparke jijnasa karara jan'ya. Tini kapheradera jan'ya yantranadayaka sasti prastuta rekhechena.

He muminagana! Tomara tomadera prati allahara neyamatera katha smarana kara, yakhana satrubahini tomadera nikatabarti hayechila, atahpara ami tadera birud'dhe jhancabayu ebam emana sain'yabahini prerana karechilama, yaderake tomara dekhate na. Tomara ya kara, allaha ta dekhena.

Yakhana tara tomadera nikatabarti hayechila ucca bhumi o nimnabhumi theke ebam yakhana tomadera drstibhrama hacchila, prana kanthagata hayechila ebam tomara allaha samparke nana birupa dharana posana karate suru karachile.
Se samaye muminagana pariksita hayechila ebam bhisanabhabe prakampita hacchila.
Ebam yakhana munaphika o yadera antare roga chila tara balachila, amaderake pradatta allaha o rasulera pratisruti pratarana bai naya.

Ebam yakhana tadera ekadala balechila, he iyasarebabasi, eta tikabara mata jayaga naya, tomara phire cala. Tadera'i ekadala nabira kache anumati prarthana kare balechila, amadera bari-ghara khali, athaca segulo khali chila na, palayana kara'i chila tadera iccha.
Yadi satrupaksa caturdika theke nagare prabesa kare tadera sathe milita hata, atahpara bidroha karate prarocita karata, tabe tara abasya'i bidroha karata ebam tara mote'i bilamba karata na.
Athaca tara purbe allahara sathe angikara karechila ye, tara prstha pradarsana karabe na. Allahara angikara samparke jijnasa kara habe.
